channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mahmoud Khalil didn’t wear a mask. He’s now the face of Trump’s crackdown on campus protests
'Huawei lobbyists' held in Belgium raids over EU corruption
item.description: The prosecutor's office said it raided 21 addresses in Belgium, according to local media.

item.title: Judge dismisses Fox News from sexual assault lawsuit against former star
item.description: A federal judge has dismissed Fox News as a defendant in a lawsuit filed against former anchor Ed Henry. Former producer Jennifer Eckhart alleges he s...

item.title: Measles highest in 25 years in Europe, WHO says
item.description: Children under five constituted more than 40% of the cases reported in Europe and Central Asia last year.

item.title: Stocks dip in early trading as investors fret over volley of tariffs
item.description: U.S. stocks resume slide as President Trump threatens to hit the European Union with 200% tariff.

item.title: Pete Buttigieg says he won't run for Senate, leaving door open for possible White House bid
item.description: Former Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg​ announced Thursday he won't seek an open Senate seat in Michigan next year, keeping the door open for ...

item.title: Southern African forces to leave DR Congo as rebels gain ground
item.description: At least 17 soldiers from Malawi and South Africa have been killed in DR Congo.

item.title: Intrigued by buy-now, pay-later loans? Experts break down 6 pros and cons
item.description: If you're curious about that option to "pay in four easy installments" on the checkout page when shopping online, here's what to know.

item.title: EPA targets dozens of regulations. And, 'stranded' astronauts may return to Earth

item.title: What is known about the deadly January air crash between a passenger jet and US Army helicopter
What Greenland's elections mean for the island — and the U.S.
item.description: This week's vote resulted in a win for pro-independence forces and a rejection of President Trump's rhetoric about annexing the island.

item.title: Woman arrested in US for allegedly holding stepson captive for 20 years
item.description: Police say the man, who set a fire to escape, was held captive by his stepmother from age 11. He weighed 68 pounds when he was freed.

item.title: 3 tips for getting the best HELOC rate this March
item.description: HELOC interest rates are on a steep decline. Here are three ways to get a great rate right now.

item.title: Kuwait frees jailed Americans, including veterans held on drug charges
item.description: Private consultant Jonathan Franks said that additional Americans he represents are expected to be released by Kuwait later.

item.title: 'Killed in front of our eyes': How the Pakistan train hijacking unfolded
item.description: Passengers tell the BBC of the 30-hour siege and their escape.
